casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kyle BERRY. No. 389A01-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2005. William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Kyle Berry. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of September 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Kyle Berry) shall have up to and including the 1st day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of October 2005."
